website_summaries.verdict: If you have children or pets in the house, consider using these roach bait stations from Combat. The stations contain the bait, so there's no stick application process.
pros: Place wherever you have seen roaches
Best for places like under sinks, behind toilets, and behind appliances
cons: Traps may not allow largest roaches to access the bait

customer_reviews.title: Dead roaches in less than 24 hours!
customer_reviews.text: I put these out around my bathroom where I had been seeing the large palmetto bugs that are prevalent in Texas and Florida. It was out less than 24 hours and I begin seeing dead or dying roaches. My friend was a chemist and he said the active ingredient in these, Fipronel, Is what makes them so highly effective. He said they don’t all contain this and to look for it. These are incredible. I replace them about every three months but had neglected for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: LaSirena

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but keep away from pets, dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently my min pin is part cockroach! While I through him a treat, he struggles to find it. We put a couple of these babies out, and vavoom, he's attracted just like a roach! Ooopsie! Not trying to eradicate Fido! Just wanted to let other pet owners know to be careful with these and put them far out of reach of fur babies, because I totally didn't foresee that being sn issue and it was!!!
customer_reviews.author: Srp505

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually more impressed with this than I thought I would be. I recently moved into a new house and was seeing one cockroach a day most days (and I killed them all, so it was all different ones). I live in a somewhat rural area, so it’s expensive to get pest control out here. I ordered this product, not expecting much, but this easily exceeded my low expectations. I set out the traps the day before I went out of town for 5 days - this was a month ago. Since returning, I have not seen a single cockroach. I will definitely continue to purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie E. Massaro

customer_reviews.title: Safe, Effective Roach Control.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, set out the bait stations, no mess, no chemicals, to mix, or spray, and roaches disappear. Replace every three months as suggested, and roaches are not seen anymore. Kills roaches, and kills roach nests. Live in Florida, and roaches are a part of life here, but not with Combat. Big, or small, Combat gets them all. Have used Combat for many years, and have little, as in an occasional roach, or no roach problems at all. Safe, no odours, just no more roaches. That's what I like.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Sayes

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: We had a big roach problem in our garage. Specifically with those large "water bugs" that you commonly find in eastern NC where we lived. We were getting ready to move and we didn't want to take those guys with us! I set out all 8 traps around our garage and within 2-3 days we were roach free. The carnage from all the dead roaches laying around was satisfying and horrifying. As the movers were taking our stuff out a few weeks later I still didn't see a single sign of a roach. These worked amazingly well. I would recommend to anyone who has a roach problem!
customer_reviews.author: Surg Family

customer_reviews.title: Instructions say put 8 cartridges down for best results, I decided to do half and put ...
customer_reviews.text: Roaches started showing up in my garage and eventually inside the house. Instructions say put 8 cartridges down for best results, I decided to do half and put four down in my garage. Next evening, no roaches. Two weeks later, none. Five weeks, none. It's now been 4 months, no roaches. Bam and done, just the way I like it. If you have a roach problem, don't buy anything else than this product. Also, don't waste money and time on an exterminator.
customer_reviews.author: John T Stallworth

customer_reviews.title: Use this and 3 other baits if you truly want to rid you house of these nasty creatures
customer_reviews.text: Use this with Advion 383920 4 Tubes and 4 Plungers Cockroach German Roach Pest Control Inse, Brown, actually I used 2 different combat stations, 1 with hydramethylon?, and 1 with fipronil, until I used all three I couldn't get rid of them. Use those three, OH and BORIC ACID tabs. If you want them gone, use all four, wage war against these %*^*&)$% and you will be rid of them
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected... Now that it's getting hot been seeing some of these coming out so I put these in the bathroom, in low cabinet and behind the fridge... I used to place them by the door but I can't anymore as I must hide them as the dog will try to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: BAM BAM

customer_reviews.title: I have been buying for 10 years!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a new pack of these every year - two years. They are amazing. When I moved into my current home 10 years ago I had a lot of cockroaches. These took care of the problem. About a year later, the roaches came back. I bought another pack and the roaches disappeared again. I know when it is time to buy a new pack once I start seeing roaches again. I am buying a pack today :-)
customer_reviews.author: S. Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: No More Roach Problem
customer_reviews.text: So Florida spring and summer brings these icky big roaches that come in through my garage. I place a few of these in the garage and place them in places the roaches like to go and hide in like the laundry room and then I don't have a roach problem anymore!! Glad I tried them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure that they work at all. I've had them for a while now. I was expecting to see dead roaches in my garage but those dang things are still alive. I decided to just spray around the bottom edge of my garage with poison. I guess I will see how that turns out. I feel this was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryle Acosta

customer_reviews.title: got rid of mine
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a pretty bad roach problem at night coming into kitchen to get a drink there were several. Now I use 2 of the electronic signal generators and a box of these around the house and rarely see even one! Does a fantastic job even in our humid world on the gulf coast USA
customer_reviews.author: Shizcrow

customer_reviews.title: No more roaches
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Recommended to me by an associate at Home Depot and boy was he right! Within days roaches in the kitchen were gone. I was concerned about having insecticides around my pets. By putting the trays under my stove, refrigerator and cabinets they were out of reach of my small dogs. Within a week to 10 days NO MORE PESTS. Thanks Combat!
customer_reviews.author: valerie thomas

customer_reviews.title: NO EXTERMINATOR NEEDED FOR ROACHES!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! You will NOT have roaches in your house using this. I have used it for many years! I place some outside is specific places where I have Seen roaches, also.
customer_reviews.author: EARL SCARBER

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and not working
customer_reviews.text: My apt has some big cockroaches and I try to use this to eliminate them. They don’t work. Still have cockroaches all over. And the price is pretty expensive. I wouldn’t buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: No More Roaches!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical that this product would take care of the problem and thought I would probably need an exterminator. I was WRONG! These Bait Stations work incredibly well. After setting the stations out the first day I saw two roaches. The next day I saw one. It has now been almost five months and despite a very wet Summer we have seen NO roaches! Before I purchased these, a reviewer recommended getting the Large Bait stations and I recommend that as well. I am so glad I read the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: L Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t seen a roach in months
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is powerful. Purchased this around Christmas, it’s february and I haven’t seen a roach in months. Started working a few days after purchasing. Also love that we can slide them under furniture / under sinks and forget about them... we have 2 dogs and a cat and they’re totally safe from them vs spraying chemicals everywhere... awesome product & a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: No more Palmetto Roaches
customer_reviews.text: During summer months we get a few Palmetto roaches in the house. Since we placed in house and outside, we have not had any in the house. Why didn't I get these earlier???
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L.

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Made a huge difference in number of roaches I saw around my house. Right after using them, you will find some dead roaches on the ground, but after a couple weeks stopped seeing them all together, and they haven't come back years later. Bought this after the experience at my house for my girlfriend's apartment who got them, and worked well there too, though in apartments it's usually your neighbors that attract them!
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: These work awesome. I used to have a problem with roaches ...
customer_reviews.text: These work awesome. I used to have a problem with roaches in my house and I placed one of these in each of the corners of the front portch and in the corners in the garage near the garage door. It was like the roaches almost completely disappeared. They work for large and small roaches. I usually buy some and put new ones out at around may or so, then change them out the next may.
customer_reviews.author: jason finn

customer_reviews.title: Great value and product. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This product helped us. I was not over concerned but enough to warrant purchasing them. Haven’t seen one since. Great value too.
customer_reviews.author: baby momma knows

customer_reviews.title: Fast results; easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and worked fast. Unnoticed a lot of cockroaches on our patio at night - if I turned on the light at night, 3-4 would be visible right away on the steps. Soon, I noticed them in the house too! A big cockroach is not a pleasant surprise. I set up these traps with some outside and some inside. Within a week, I did not see cockroaches outside or inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley May Casper

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Will Not Let Me Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Amazon suddenly will not let me purchase this item, which I have previously bought, for no reason. I can not contact anyone to complain about this, either. Roaches are a threat to public health, so why ban the purchase of roach traps?
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Must be working well as I have not seen a ...
customer_reviews.text: Must be working well as I have not seen a roach in the house for over a year. If I do see them, they are dead in a far corner.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great - one pack is enough for 1 BR small apartment
customer_reviews.text: Great roach bait. I have a small one bedroom apartment, and one pack is enough for me. I place several baits within a small kitchen, and a few in my bedroom and one in my small bathroom. After the first few months of usage, I used to see several dead roaches in areas near the baits. Now, two years into using (and replacing every 3-5 months), I have not seen a roach anywhere in my apartment. Maybe there was one or two within a year span, but roaches are definitely no longer a worry for me.
customer_reviews.author: ylime

customer_reviews.title: No more buggies!
customer_reviews.text: Had started to notice some wood roaches from outside getting into my house. Usually one or two every now and then was okay but it was starting to get a little out of hand. Bought two packs of these and placed them around my house then a bunch of dead roaches started popping up! Cleaned up the dead ones and haven't seen a live or dead roach since. I will definitely be buying these again when the time runs out on them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael allen

customer_reviews.title: safety net
customer_reviews.text: My mother was visiting from out of state where roaches reside. She had a problem but had been bombed by a professional a number of times and was confident the problem was gone. Even though we live in the cold tundra of the North, we have central heat, so they could thrive in our home. We got this to put in the corners of the room she would be staying in, just to make sure. We didn't see any, but it helps to ease our minds that if there were any, they are gonners. For some reason, our cat was completely enamored with them and would try to steal them from the room to chew on... wierd.
customer_reviews.author: Woland

customer_reviews.title: Best cockroach solution
customer_reviews.text: Best cockroach solution! I've been using this for years. The cockroach slowly die off after eating something in the traps. See a significant change. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Worked good, will buy again if needed
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have worked very well as cockroach sightings reduced dramatically in the week following deployment. Setting them all out at the same time is best to ensure that there are no stragglers getting through.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Furlanetto

customer_reviews.title: Manager here sucks about the pest control
customer_reviews.text: Killed all the roaches in the gated community :))) I could see roaches from small to giant everywhere and everyday when we moved in to this apt community. Manager here sucks about the pest control. I bought 4 packs, used one in our apt and 3 others everywhere I could hide it outside in our community. It took around 10 days for all roaches to be gone. It's been two months now and I don't see any roaches or water bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Denis T

customer_reviews.title: LARGE SIZE IS A GOOD REMEDY FOR BUBBAH ROACHES
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that I actually LOVE a roach bait station but they do work. In North Carolina we prefer to call these Water Bugs, but they probably really are roaches and they are big -- so I can appreciate these large traps. When the seasons change they try to move inside and can be quite stubborn about entry. Just be sure to put them where nosy dogs won't find them.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Woodcock

customer_reviews.title: Dead roaches... YAY!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what is different in the formulation from other Combat Roach products, but they are different. Living here in Florida, bugs are part of life. The Combat Source Kill Max in LARGE is the only one that works. The roaches seem to think the others sizes/styles of Combat are put out for their partying pleasure. This style of Combat works wonders! No bugs for months!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna H. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: These seem to work fine. We saw a couple roaches in our livingroom which is why we got them, and haven't seen any since.
customer_reviews.author: JenMom20

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with this product at all. I put ...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this product at all. I put out all 8 or so traps I bought at the same time. 4 in the kitchen and the rest upstairs in the bathrooms. After reading many glowing reviews here and elsewhere I thought they were going to solve my problem (seeing 1 - 3 roaches every few evenings), but the product didn't even put a dent in it. It actually seems to have attracted more than I originally had. I've had to hire an exterminator which is what I was trying to avoid to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: They Work!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after only being able to find the little stations at the local grocery store. After reading all of the great reviews, I figured I'd give these a try and I can say since putting these out, I've found several dead roaches (I know, gross) lying around on the front porch and bathroom. That's a good sign to me!! I placed two on the front porch, two at the back deck and in the bathrooms about two weeks ago and haven't seen a LIVE roach since!
customer_reviews.author: W. Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it helps
customer_reviews.text: Live in an older house so no matter what I do I still have those gross things. This seemed to help a little
customer_reviews.author: Abs H

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for me these did not work. Easy to use though. Have to find something stronger.
customer_reviews.author: PJA

customer_reviews.title: Believe it's working/Be careful if you have pets
customer_reviews.text: If you have pets, be careful...we placed one behind the toilet and accidentally left the bathroom door open, and our 7 lb yorkie was under the bed chewing it up. She turned out to be fine but gave us quite a scare. We purchased, because we had recently seen 2 large roaches in the bathroom. Since we have put these down, we have seen 3 dead and 1 alive. It's been about a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Works good..
customer_reviews.text: Put these out. Saw a few dead roaches at first. Haven't seen any for quite a while now. Seems to be doing the job'
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin T. Horne III

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Combined with gel, never seen another roach since major infestation and first use. It’s like crack to them and wipes out entire nest. Replace every 6 months just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: BEST roach traps for Florida where we have tons of roaches
customer_reviews.text: If you aren't familiar, Florida and it's tropical climate brings stray roaches into homes all the time! They are such a nuisance. These bugs are NOT easy to get rid of. I don't have an infestation but I get strays all the time, especially in the garage. These traps are the only traps that have ever worked for me. I'm not sure if they kill palmetto bugs too and that's whats helping, but they are a miracle! I will never buy a different brand again. Amazingly, I've had these traps out for a few months past the 3 month replacement date and haven't seen a single roach!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The roaches are growing bu the day !!! The product sold may be lifeless dud or very ineffective...
customer_reviews.author: aadithya s.

customer_reviews.title: Best roach product I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Best roach product I've tried. I live in Florida, and roaches are a NIGHTMARE down here, especially when it rains. I placed a few scattered around the house and attic, and one just outside the front and back doors. The only roaches I've seen since trying this product are either dead or dying. AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Augusta

customer_reviews.title: In city or suburbs, this works
customer_reviews.text: We first used Combat years ago in center city Philadelphia in our college apt overrun with roaches. We even requested the apt pest control to skip our apt because the Combat worked better. We are still using these in Houston TX now where the roaches can get BAD. This stuff is the only thing that really works with no spraying, no 'bombing' and no loose particles.
customer_reviews.author: P. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of those nasty summer roaches
customer_reviews.text: Only need 3 months of the year so one box is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Combat works. Problem is tenants keep re introducing.
customer_reviews.text: Also use roach motels. We can see positive results over time with fewer visitors to Roach motel boxes.
customer_reviews.author: T. Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I placed these in our kitchen, bathroom and Livingroom. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: didn't work in Israel
customer_reviews.text: I guess we have different Roaches here, in the end paid for someone to spray the area
customer_reviews.author: Gal Angel

customer_reviews.title: Update coming let's see how well these traps work
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.... great for price. Will do an update in a week
customer_reviews.author: Dietra

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: After living in a heavily infested apartment building, I was worried that I'd bring the problem to my new place. These traps seem to be quite effective -- I've only noticed one or two live roaches since setting them out. This one is marked "for large roaches", though it seems to work on the small ones, too.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy - they don’t do anything
customer_reviews.text: These don’t work! We didn’t see any changes with our roach problem or any sign that they were even being used. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Sam Kissinger

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. I keep getting large wood roaches coming in from outside when the weather turns bad. I put half a package of these out and the roaches all disappear or I find them dead. A couple months later I start to notice them again and put out the rest of the bait.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Florida Roaches
customer_reviews.text: Well my wife saw a "Palmetto Bug" which is Florida speak for a very large roach. The good part is they are easy to spot and don't cause any health issues. I placed these Combat baits all around the kitchen when we went away for a week and when we returned there was a dead Palmetto bug in the middle of the floor. We have not seen any since so it is doing it's job and my wife is happy. So am I since she wanted to call an exterminator.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great assurance!
customer_reviews.text: I found roaches in my kitchen one day. Just two of them, but it scared me so much! My house is so clean, it made me feel dirty! After putting these in my kitchen, I feel so much more assured that I am safe from pests in my hosue :) Haven't seen any again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: The only that resolve my problem
customer_reviews.text: I tried differents stuff even the injections and this is the only that works at my house for keep it clean of cockroaches
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Suriel

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be doing the job! When I ...
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be doing the job! When I moved into my florida apartment I was seeing a few roaches a week but now I very occassionally see a dead one. I am on a cycle of replacing them every 2.5-3 months. Everyone else I know sprays inside their homes but having a dog I did 't want to do that. This seems just as effective!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Can't find them in stores---thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Combat works better than having an exterminator. So glad Amazon has them for the extra large roaches (water bugs) as I can't find them in the stores. In the summer the garage in my apartment building has water bugs and sometimes they get all the way to the fifth floor!
customer_reviews.author: Midtowngal

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting for it to work
customer_reviews.text: Well I got it for a couple weeks now. I still see cockroaches roaming around though. Not sure when this gonna work.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Le

customer_reviews.title: not worth to buy it at all
customer_reviews.text: It has no effect at all. Not worth to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Wang

customer_reviews.title: thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried everything!! Who knew simply putting out some bait traps would work!!!??!!! I moved into a place that had roaches and was locked into my lease or I'd have split. Lol. But thankfully these worked and I have not seen any of those nasty boogars in months! <3.
customer_reviews.author: Kit-Kat74

customer_reviews.title: Lasts 6 months
customer_reviews.text: 2015 Mistress Susan Secret Stuff Awards Winner for Best Pest Control. I laid down all 8 traps in my 525sq ft condo. I saw 2 roaches the first 2 weeks, then I saw NO roaches the next 6 months. I am ONLY replacing the traps because it is spring so I will put new ones down every fall and spring.
customer_reviews.author: Mistress Susan TV

customer_reviews.title: American Roaches?--yep, my exterminator told me
customer_reviews.text: I had these huge roaches that made a grown man like me cry out. My exterminator told me they were not cockroaches, they were called American roaches. Big, slow, and kind of a chillin' kind of roach. Not frantic like a cockroach. I guess they were here already, don't even go there with me. I don' see them hanging out on the edge of a big soup spoon in my drawer politely tilting their antennae. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: normco

customer_reviews.title: The roaches disappeared!?
customer_reviews.text: The box warns that you'll find dead roaches after deploy this, but they completely disappeared. I directly attribute the results to these bait stations. I haven't seen a single roach since I put these out!
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: ONLY thing to kill large cockroaches.
customer_reviews.text: In Hawai'i you "share" housing with cockroaches. No matter how clean you keep your home...these roaches invade. These bait stations are the ONLY thing we could find to keep the roaches under some control and we dealt with roaches that were HUGE and could fly!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Nuschler

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I have used before so I know that it's very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Moore

customer_reviews.title: Ants don't like roaches?
customer_reviews.text: I used to go to my kitchen at midnight to get a snack, and see about a dozen little roaches before they disappeared into the darkness. Within a week of placing these around my house, THAT NUMBER WENT STRAIT TO ZERO! Somehow though 2 days after I started noticing that they went extinct, I started getting a lot of ants o_0
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Took out a entire nest of waterbugs we found in this sewage type area just by dropping a couple in it. Only have seen 1 bug since.
customer_reviews.author: monster42

customer_reviews.title: Territo
customer_reviews.text: I bought one at Walmart, it works. But this doesn't work + has some bizarre legal information!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Bugs didnt come back for 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Coupon Queen!

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works like they are suppose. Havent seen any more roaches
customer_reviews.author: Sims Family

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lay and does a clean job
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I see roaches start to appear I drop one of these and that is the end of it. Easy to lay and does a clean job. Prefer the convenience of traps vs calling an exterminator.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: started killing roaches in my place within a day
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I am shocked how fast it started killing the roaches. I am a college student sharing a house with 3 housemates and we have a big Roach problem. I purchased two boxes of this stuff and place the contents all around my room and bathroom. The next morning I started seeing dead roaches. As the days go by, I am seeing more and more dead roaches and less alive ones. In fact, I barely see live roaches in my room and bathroom now. After seeing such great results, I promptly ordered a couple more boxes. It does the job for a great price. If you have a roach problem, this will kill them.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Black

customer_reviews.title: Not sure...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure if these are working or not. We saw 2-3 roaches a month before this product. We put out all of them in various locations about 3 weeks ago and we have seen one roach since then and it was alive. No dead roaches yet. Maybe I didn't have an infestation in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Finney

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Combat Max Kill for large roaches keeps the large roach, which we tend to have in Georgia, to a minimum. I use them both inside and outside (if covered), and if we see one, it is usually sick or already dead. I don't even use a pest control company anymore. These are excellent, and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Lover

customer_reviews.title: No more live roaches!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this product. When I moved in this house, we had a bad roach issue (we'd see a couple daily) Since I have put these around the rooms, I haven't seen any live roaches. This was a great investment. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: so I guess it works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use for prevention. Don't have any bugs. Haven't had bugs since I moved into my home 4 years ago, so I guess it works great!
customer_reviews.author: BuyBooks4Less

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these bait stations for a couple of years now. They are very effective in eliminating the local “palmetto bugs.” They last a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: G. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Roaches gone
customer_reviews.text: I put these out every summer when the roaches start crawling around, and then the roaches are gone like magic.
customer_reviews.author: TOakenshld

customer_reviews.title: These worked great. Had waterbugs all over
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. Had waterbugs all over, in the sink, shower, bed, running along the walls and floor at night. A few days after putting these in some key locations not a single one, for months now. The great part is I have another batch of traps for when the current ones wear off, this is a bargain for what it accomplishes. Great product!
